name: Lio Fotia dating Simulator- a Promare Fan Game
name_original: Lio Fotia dating Simulator- a Promare Fan Game
description:
#WARNING- this game contains mild sexual content and violence

it is comedic in nature however I wanted to put a warning, just in case.

Since my first game HimboxTwinkSimulator got a lot of positive feedback, I decided to make a second Promare dating sim- exceot this time, you play as the Himbo, instead of the twink. There are three endings, one bad, one BAD, and one good ending.

I'd highly reccomend playing to get at least two of these endings- but it's up to you!

I hope you enjoy!

+I'VE DECIDED TO MAKE A KEY FOR THE GOOD ENDING

my apologies, I made this one kinda tricky.

for the first choice 'walk up to him'

either answer is correct

for the second choice 'what is your name'

the correct answer is "boyfriend material"

for the third choice  when kray confronts you 

either answer is acceptable

for the fourth choice when Lio calls you stupid

'I may be stupid but my meat is huge'

for the fifth one 

'give him something  from your pocket'

for the sixth option 

say no to kray
